function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lifting of onshore gas exploration moratoria","Impact":"Increased risk of environmental pollution and disruption to local ecosystems","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict environmental regulations and the use of sustainable exploration techniques","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring technologies for gas exploration","People":"Local communities, wildlife, and ecosystems","Owner":"Environmental regulatory bodies and local governments"},{"Description":"Exclusion of wind and solar from the US COVID-19 stimulus package","Impact":"Limiting the transition to clean energy and promoting reliance on fossil fuels","Mitigation":"Advocacy for clean energy policies and investment in renewable energy projects","Technologies":"Advanced solar and wind energy technologies","People":"Advocacy groups, clean energy industries, and the public","Owner":"Policy makers and government officials"},{"Description":"Support for coal operations under a major drinking water reservoir in Australia","Impact":"Risk of water contamination and negative health effects on local populations","Mitigation":"Stringent monitoring and regulation of coal operations, and investment in alternative water sources","Technologies":"Water quality monitoring technologies and renewable water supply systems","People":"Local communities and water consumers","Owner":"Environmental regulatory bodies and water management authorities"}]}
